content.rendered:
Victoria and Chris celebrated their marriage with a moody wedding at The Bridge Building full of dramatic mauve floral arrangements, touches of gold, and a romantic ambiance. 

The pair met back in 2012 through Chris’ love of photography, and they’ve hit it off ever since. Chris later proposed to Victoria in November 2019. 

The soon-to-be newlyweds began their fall wedding day with a first look at the historic hotel in Downtown Nashville, the Hermitage. Victoria was dressed in an A-line gown with a sweetheart neckline and embroidered lace. 

As for the rest of the wedding party, the bridesmaids were in mix-and-match deep green dresses in different fabrics, and the groomsmen wore classic suits with silky green ties. 

The Cumberland space of The Bridge Building was set with a floating floral install that served as the ceremony and sweetheart table backdrop, Edison bulb lighting for a warm glow, black chairs, and a city view. 

Once the newlyweds said “I do,” guests enjoyed a few delectable appetizers, including fresh oysters, bacon-wrapped dates, and smoked trout, on the riverfront patio while the Infinity staff flipped the space for the reception. 

In exchange for their place card to find their seats, guests were encouraged to snap a quick Polaroid photo to leave for the couple as an alternative to a traditional guestbook. 

For the reception, the tables were set with black linens, gold chargers, vintage-inspired glassware, and black taper candles in brass candlesticks inside hurricane vases, along with moody floral arrangements featuring shades of mauve and purple, dark greenery, and dainty white flowers.

Guests enjoyed selections of filet mignon with grilled asparagus and white cheddar potato gratin, blackberry pork loin with sweet potato mash and broccolini, and sesame crusted yellowfin tuna with a daikon and carrot salad with teriyaki edamame soba noodles before grabbing a prepackaged Christie Cookie, a local favorite. 

Victoria and Chris shared a sweet first dance to “I Love You Baby” by Frankie Valley before the DJ opened the dance floor and everyone celebrated the night away! 

Keep scrolling for more details of Victoria + Chris’ moody fall wedding.

WEDDING DETAILS

Date: October 30, 2021
Happy Couple: Victoria + Chris
Location: The Bridge Building
Guest Count: 66
Colors: Black, Green, and Gold 
Photographer: Taylor English Photography 
Florist: Forget Me Not Designs
Cake: Nashville Sweets
Party Favor: Christie Cookie
Rentals: Event Works
Entertainment: EntertainTN + Jana Brown
Catering & Bar: The Bridge Building
Production Design: Nashville Lighting & Production
Planning: Cassidy + Haley C  | IH

excerpt.rendered: A moody fall wedding day with vintage details at the Bridge Building.
